question: Which among the following is a correct sentence about Non-bank financial companies NFBC & a Bank?
option1: Both Banks & NFBC may accept demand deposits
option2: Both Banks and NFBC avail the deposit insurance facility
option3: Banks may issue checks (Cheques) but NFBC may not
answer: Both Banks and NFBC avail the deposit insurance facility
explanation: please note that NFBC can accept demand deposits and only Banks may avail the deposit insurance facility
